notes: Long-term Q&A and mappings so the agent can avoid asking repeat questions about your background.

qa_history.question: Have you used Kubernetes in a professional project?
qa_history.answer: Yes, at Company X where I deployed services on a GKE cluster.

qa_history.question: Which experiences demonstrate your React/TypeScript (or similar modern frontend) work?
qa_history.answer: RoomieRanks (Vue.js + TypeScript + Golang/API work) and the ECSE 321 video game store project (Vue.js frontend tied to Spring Boot/Java/PostgreSQL). I contributed across frontend pages, REST endpoints, services, and repos.

experience_refs.hint: Vue.js + TypeScript frontend, Golang REST APIs, MySQL schema design
Spring Boot + Java backend with Vue.js frontend for a video game store

kubernetes.notes: Managed workloads on Kubernetes (GKE) and wrote Helm charts.

react.notes: Built Vue.js (React-adjacent) frontend with TypeScript and collaborated on Golang APIs.
Implemented Vue.js frontend pages and integrated with Spring Boot REST services.

typescript.notes: TypeScript-based Vue components plus GitHub collaboration across the stack.

vue.js.notes: Led Vue.js frontend work, games page UX, and TypeScript component logic.
Co-built the Vue.js storefront tied to Spring Boot services and PostgreSQL.
